#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start a Bangle Selling Business
#Text=Bangles are bracelets that have been a fashion staple for decades .
#Text=If you have design talent and are interested in selling handmade jewelry , making and selling bangles could be a great work from home business niche .
#Text=Specialize in fun decorated plastic bangles or make more intricate cuff bangles from wire .
#Text=To get started , learn how to start a bangle selling business , market your products and grow your business .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Decide what kinds of bangles to sell and who to sell to . Start by defining your target customer , and then figure out what kind of products the customer will buy .
#Text=For example , plastic bangles can be marketed to children or young women , while wire or metal cuff bangles are a good choice for adults .
#Text=Any type of bangle can be promoted as a gift item or customized for special occasions like holidays , weddings and parties .
#Text=Find and order supplies .
#Text=Build a relationship with suppliers who are reliable and sell quality products .
#Text=Keep track of where you order supplies from and the item numbers for quick ordering .
#Text=Some supplies you may need include plastic bangles , wire , beads , pliers and glue , depending on what type of bangles you decide to make .
#Text=Organize and create your work area .
#Text=You 'll need spaces for making and decorating bangles , shipping orders and handling correspondence , marketing and orders .
#Text=Get advice from an attorney , small business advisor or accountant about how to start a bangle selling business , including handling taxes , insurance and licensing .
#Text=Find out whether to set up your company as a corporation or sole proprietorship .
#Text=Register your business with the IRS .
#Text=You can either register in your name , or come up with a name for your business and then register the name . Get necessary local and state licenses .
#Text=Call your local zoning office or business association to find out what licenses you need .
#Text=Team up with other craftspeople .
#Text=Look for people who make jewelry or accessories that are complimentary to your bangles .
#Text=Join together to sell your products wholesale or retail .
#Text=Come up with a marketing plan of how to sell and advertise your handmade jewelry .
#Text=Places to sell include local boutiques , craft shops , party and holiday related stores and jewelry stores .
#Text=Set up shops on Etsy , eBay or other online storefronts and boutiques .
#Text=Consider adding other handmade jewelry items to increase sales .
#Text=Read books , get information online , and take local or online classes to learn the practical aspects of running a home business .
#Text=Learn how to keep records , do basic accounting and market your products .
#Text=Create a website and other online profiles .
#Text=A blog can help personalize your bangles , show how they can be used and make it easier to find your bangles .
#Text=Create profiles on social networking sites , especially Facebook , Myspace and Flickr .

#Text=Promote your handmade jewelry on forums and sites that your customers visit , like mom forums to promote childrens ' bangles for children or fashion related sites to market products for adults .
